articles.title: DART Team Confirms Orbit of Targeted Asteroid - NASA
articles.description: DART, which is the world’s first attempt to change the speed and path of an asteroid’s motion in space, tests a method of asteroid deflection that could prove useful if such a need arises in the future for planetary defense.
